General.Name: Renta Corporacion Real Estate SA
General.Description: Renta Corporación Real Estate, S.A., a real estate company, engages in the acquisition, refurbishment, and sale of real estate properties in the cities of Barcelona and Madrid, Spain. The company acquires various properties, including residential, offices, commercial, or hotels properties. It is also involved in managing various types of real estate assets. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.
